channel.title: Using Things with Drafts
channel.description:
![app-icon|105x105](upload://8TkBBOns1QXDlDrDyFnTGmfM0Ei.png)
- [**App Store - iPhone**](https://itunes.apple.com/us/app/id904237743?mt=8&uo=4&at=11l4Cf&ct=directory) - [[**App Store - iPad**](https://itunes.apple.com/us/app/things-3-for-ipad/id904244226?mt=8) - **URL Scheme**: things:// - [**URL Scheme Documentation**](https://support.culturedcode.com/customer/en/portal/articles/2803573-things-url-scheme)
Things 3 can be integrated with Drafts in a number of powerful ways.
### Sending Individual Tasks
Things has an iOS Share extension which can be used with Drafts' Share action, or URL-based actions can be used to send the text of the current draft as a task to Things inbox.
- [**Task in Things**](http://actions.getdrafts.com/a/1CO) - Send draft to Things as new task, using first line as the title and the remaining text as a note.
### Scripting Things
Drafts provides convenience wrappers for Things more advanced URL schemes which allow creation of multiple tasks or even whole projects with tags and dates assigned, etc.
Documentation for [Things Scripting](https://scripting.getdrafts.com/classes/tjscontainer.html) is available at our Scripting Reference site, and many example actions utilizing these methods can be found by [searching the Action Directory](http://actions.getdrafts.com/search?utf8=✓&search_type=actions&q=things&button=)
### Emailing To Things
Things also provides a [Mail to Things](https://support.culturedcode.com/customer/en/portal/articles/2908262-using-mail-to-things) feature which can be used along with Drafts [Mail script steps](http://getdrafts.com/actions/steps/mail) to send email to your unique Things email address.
### Other Advanced Examples
Looking to build full project templates in Drafts, you might be interest in Peter Davison-Reiber's excellent [Things Parser](https://forums.getdrafts.com/t/things-parser-2-0/158) action.
